item.description:
Our group is the co-coordinator & co-sponsor of this event. We have co-coordinated with the host Christian Ayala (president of UCONN Freethinkers) and co-sponsored with the Connecticut Valley Atheist to donate David's books to the undergrads.

For those who can, please come out to support this event. This is a free event and your attendance is more than appreciated as it shows the young students that they have their surrounding community's support. Thank you.


UConn Freethinkers Presents: David Niose
Wednesday, September 12th 7pm-9pm
Wilbur Cross Building, North Reading Room

Map:Â http://maps.uconn.edu/

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: UCONN Freethinkers Present: David Niose - Author of Non Believer Nation
